## Solved

### 2024-02-06 survey$data_collector_id

Where does one find the detailed information about the "survey$data_collector_id.

Get the ids:
```{r}
s1 <- fm_survey(key, trim = FALSE)
s1 |> glimpse()
collector_id <-
  s1 |> 
  pull(data_collector_id) |> 
  unique()
collector_id
```

Try this:

```{r}
partyD <- fm_tbl("partyD", key)
partyD |> 
  filter(party_id %in% collector_id) |> 
  glimpse()
```
